physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient had a history of hypoparathyroidism with serum calcium and PTH levels below normal ranges prior to treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient required lower doses of calcium and vitamin D over time, which indicated improvement in parathyroid function.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient's vitamin D and calcium supplementation decreased; ongoing improvement in parathyroid function was observed.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient's serum PTH and calcium levels were within normal ranges without supplementation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued improvement in parathyroid function with stable serum calcium and rising PTH levels.
